name: AX: PORTAL SLAYERS
description:
Real-time PVP

  • Experience real-time battles with other players in various modes.
  • Offers diverse PVP modes, including 5v5 battles.

Monster Hunting

  • Hunt various monsters to upgrade your abilities, and acquire firearms and items to prepare for battles.
  • Encounter a variety of monsters such as imps, goblins, orcs, and elves.

Firearms / Skills

  • A variety of firearms, including pistols, automatic rifles, sniper rifles, shotguns, are available.
  • Utilize tactical items such as mines, turrets, radars strategically.

Final Battle

  • Defeat monsters and move towards the center of the map.
  • Engage in the final battle with other players at the central colosseum on the map.
